title: Arvid Grundekjøn
text:
Arvid Grundekjøn (born 26 June 1955) is a <a href="Norway">Norwegian</a> <a href="businessperson">businessperson</a> and <a href="conservative">conservative</a> politician.
He was chairman of <a href="Statkraft">Statkraft</a> and awarded in 2009 Chair of the Year for his work, making Statkraft the largest producer of <a href="renewable%20energy%20in%20the%20European%20Union">renewable energy in Europe</a>. and <a href="Awilco%20Offshore">Anders Wilhelmsen Group</a>, and is a board member of <a href="Royal%20Caribbean%20Cruises%20Ltd.">Royal Caribbean Cruises Ltd.</a> and <a href="Dampskibsselskabet%20Norden">Dampskibsselskabet Norden</a>.
Grundekjøn is Honorary Consul for <a href="Latvia">Latvia</a> in Norway, and has been awarded with the <a href="Order%20of%20the%20Three%20Stars">Order of the Three Stars</a>.
Grundekjøn was the mayor of <a href="Kristiansand">Kristiansand</a> 2011 - 2015, representing the <a href="H%C3%B8yre">Conservative Party (Norway)</a>.
